resources.title: Master N8N Workflow Automation (Pawel Huryn Podcast)
resources.author: Pawel Huryn
resources.summary:
This podcast episode features Pawel Huryn discussing n8n, a workflow automation platform positioned as essential for product managers building AI-powered workflows. Hosted by Aakash Gupta, this is Huryn's second appearance on the show, with his first episode generating over 52K viewsâ€”indicating strong PM interest in automation tooling.

The episode covers practical n8n implementation: why to use the platform, step-by-step workflow building, converting workflows into AI agents, optimization best practices, multi-agent system design, and strategies for maximizing the free tier. For product managers, n8n represents a low-code approach to building AI automations and agent systems without deep engineering expertise.
